name: SideHead - Third Person Shooter Multiplayer
description:
SideHead

A Fast-Paced Multiplayer Third-Person Shooter that runs in your browser! 

CONTROLS: Use "WASD" to move around and Mouse to aim Use "E" to pick up items Use Number Keys 1/2/3/4/5/6 to select items from your inventory Use "T" to send messages. About:

Fight for your side in INDIA in  An underground fight club with audiences throwing all sorts of weapons for you! 

Stealth, Action, and Support play any role that lets you survive!

Connect:

A game currently in development, join the discord:

https://discord.gg/TdMyPtU4fP
